ComicInfo.Title: Doppelganger; Taxi
ComicInfo.Summary:
Doppelganger: Ronaldo sees a magazine ad where the model resembles Garnet and sets out to prove they are the same person.
Taxi: Steven decides to try using Lion as an Uber-style transportation-on-demand service.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-23 08:52:01. [CVDB471377] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 05:14:43. [Issue ID 1284579]
ComicInfo.Writer: Jackie Rent,Jeremy Sorese,Josceline Fenton,Sam Bosma,Josceline Fenton,Jeremy Sorese
ComicInfo.Penciller: Coleman Engle,Jackie Rent,Josceline Fenton,Sam Bosma,Josceline Fenton,Coleman Engle
ComicInfo.Inker: Coleman Engle,Jackie Rent,Josceline Fenton,Sam Bosma,Josceline Fenton,Coleman Engle
